price: Kaya nagsabi ako [sa kanila]: ‘Humingi kayo ng tawad sa Panginoon ninyo – tunay na Siya ay laging Palapatawad –
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
